creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
description: tankard shape with hinged lid and slot in top of lid; decorated with Hebrew, lions and floral motifs
provenance: (Antiques shop, Budapest, Hungary); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith purchased 1981; Gift to the MIA in 1998
text: This tzedakah box is based on the traditional 18th century form of a converted tankard or cup, which were often made of copper or pewter.
title: Tzedakah (justice or charity) box
